title: Chapter 4273 - Chapter 4273: 4272 Left With A Full Load
body:
Chapter 4273 - Chapter 4273: 4272 Left With A Full Load

Chapter 4273: 4272 left with a full load

Translator: 549690339

The powerful disciples of the Void dynasty were extremely terrified.

The palace that they thought was invincible had been destroyed wantonly!

Some of the royal family’s powerhouses immediately passed the news to the Tianyuan Destiny Realm powerhouses in the Void Universe.

They passed it to His Majesty the Sacred King!

In the chaotic void.

The void King and the others quickly shuttled back and forth, and the Void Pagoda would teleport from time to time.

They were moving extremely fast!

This failure made them all look extremely embarrassed!

Void King sat on the throne of void tower, staring coldly ahead.

The failure of the 9-origin universe meant the power of the 9-origin universe.

Then this calamity wouldn’t be able to compete with the 9-origin universe like the last calamity!

Evolution needed to undergo some changes!

Although the universe AI was extremely important to him, he had no choice but to give up at this moment!

He should first increase his own strength and the Void Empire’s strength!

He thought to himself!

“Buzz Buzz!”

At this moment, a message came from his communication device!

At this moment, not only him, but the other heavenly yuan creation realm powerhouses in the Void Universe also received this message.

When the Void King opened the communication device and saw the contents, his body shook.

Boom

He stood up and a terrifying aura spread out!

His eyes were wide open and his face was filled with cold killing intent!

“The dynasty palace was attacked? The Divine Dragon? How is this possible? How can a divine dragon from the 9-origin universe appear in the Void Universe? A normal controller can’t even break into the Palace!”

The king of Void looked at this information with an extremely ugly expression!

“It’s the Dragon Palace Dragon King!”

However, when he saw the confirmation from Duke Xining, his expression changed drastically!

“How did he suddenly appear in the Void Universe? How did he rush over so quickly?”

The king of Void’s expression was extremely gloomy!

“Boom! Boom!”

At this moment, the surrounding void pagodas approached him. One by one, the Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts arrived in front of the king of Void!

“Your Majesty, News has come from Duke Xining and the palace. Something has happened there!”

The middle-aged man in Golden Armor said with an ugly expression!

“I’ll rush over immediately. Damn Dragon King of the Dragon Palace, he actually destroyed my palace. Damn him!”

The Void King roared with a gloomy expression!

He moved his palm and took out a treasure.

He gritted his teeth and floated the treasure in front of him.

The treasure was a mirror.

“Peng!”

He shattered the mirror and entered it, disappearing!

This treasure was a one-time use.

Long distance teleportation!

Such a treasure was a strategic treasure for the Void King.

It could allow him to return to the Void Universe from a faraway place!

Under normal circumstances, he would not be willing to use it!

But now, his palace had been destroyed by the Dragon King!

One had to know that his palace had been built for countless years to reach its current size.

There were many treasures inside as well as the defensive measures he had built.

Now, it was being destroyed!

The king of Void rushed over, and the other heavenly yuan creation realm experts frowned.

“According to the news from the Void Universe, the palace has been severely damaged. I’m afraid the King will be furious.”

An expert from the Void Universe said helplessly!

At the same time, in the Void Universe.

Because of Duke Xining’s death this time, he was directly resurrected in the Void Universe.

Looking at the message from his subordinate, his expression was abnormally ugly.

The Dragon King of the Dragon Palace had actually charged over!

This? ? ?

He sighed helplessly.

The successive deaths had caused him to no longer have that kind of treasure that could resurrect without injury.

The current him was comparable to the weakest heavenly yuan creation realm powerhouse.

He needed a lot of time to recover from his injuries.

At this time, he did not dare to look for trouble with the Dragon King.

With the Dragon King’s strength, he could easily kill him.

He had already seen how terrifying the Dragon King was!

“Boom!”

At this time, in the sky above the palace of the Void Dynasty.

A crack appeared in the Void, and a mirror appeared!

Then, the Void King walked out of the mirror.

When the void King saw the situation in his palace below, an extremely terrifying aura directly erupted from his body!

His eyes instantly turned blood red!

“Dragon Palace, Dragon King!”

“I’m going to kill you!”

The king of Void’s originally white eyes were filled with blood. When he saw the Dragon King’s rampaging figure in front of him, he roared furiously!

At this moment, when the king of Void arrived, Wang Xian had already noticed it.

Looking at his violent expression, the energy in his entire body was boiling.

Wang Xian smiled.

“King of Void, since you dare to come to my nine-origin universe to kill, I dare to slaughter in Your Void Universe. It’s impolite to not reciprocate. The grudge between us is just the beginning!”

“HMPH, there’s still time in the future!”

Wang Xian said coldly!

This time, although the nine-origin universe suffered heavy losses.

Tens of millions of lives were killed.

However, the Void Empire also suffered heavy losses!

This was especially so for the masters of their mastery level.

One must know that the loss of the Masters of the nine-origin universe was less than one-fifth of the Void Empire!

Buzz

As soon as Wang Xian finished his sentence, his body moved.

An intense energy enveloped him from the side and they disappeared in an instant!

“Dragon King of the Dragon Palace!”

The king of Void flew towards him with a terrifying spatial energy.

A terrifying crack appeared in the space around him!

However, before he could charge over, Wang Xian had already disappeared!

The king of Void could not sense Wang Xian’s aura. His body was trembling slightly.

He scanned his surroundings.

Eighty percent of the entire palace had been destroyed.

All the treasures, divine trees and divine trees, as well as some precious items, had been taken away.

Although his most precious treasures were kept in a secret place, the treasures and resources in the palace were extremely terrifying!

Especially one treasure that almost had the might of a heavenly yuan manifestation realm!

Apart from that, the Void Dynasty Army’s losses were too huge!

The most Elite Forces in the Void Universe were all at the Void Dynasty Palace.

500,000 ruler realm experts.

They were all peak existences in the ruler realm within the Void Universe.

None of them were weaker than a level 3 universe ruler.

However, such a powerful force had been completely annihilated by the Dragon Palace Dragon King.

Among them, there were at most 1% who had resurrection treasures!

Tragic!

It was too tragic!

This time, their void universe’s losses were too tragic!

The void King’s body trembled slightly, and his breathing was somewhat hurried!

It had been a very, very long time since their void universe had suffered such a heavy loss!

“Dragon Palace Dragon King!”

He gritted his teeth hatefully and roared in a low voice.

However, there was also some helplessness!
